title: Bug 21523StyledText  caret does not move when widget shell is not open
description: build R2.0The caret does not move horizontally when the widget has not been made visibleyet (i.e., its shell has not been opened) and API is called that should movethe caret.To reproduce add the linetext.invokeAction(ST.COLUMNNEXT);to the SwtStyledTextUseCase.createWorkRegionObserve that the caret is still at offset 0 when the user case is started. Whencursor next is pressed the caret is at offset 2.The problem is that StyledText.showLocation returns scroll == true whenhorizontal scroll was called even if the horizontal scroll does not actuallyoccur because the passed scroll distance is 0.
